ktbyte.midi

Class SoundCipher

  • java.lang.Object
    • ktbyte.midi.SoundCipher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Instruments

    public class SoundCipher
extends java.lang.Object
implements Instruments
    This element can be used to create music. It is just a wrapper library over the SoundCipher library.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface ktbyte.midi.Instruments

    • Method Detail

      • playNote

        public void playNote(double pitch,
                     double dynamic,
                     double duration)
        Parameters:
        pitch - The MIDI pitch at which the note will play [0-127]
        dynamic - The loudness, MIDI velocity, of the note [0-127]
        duration - The length that the note will sound, in beats

      • playChord

        public void playChord(float[] pitches,
                      double dynamic,
                      double duration)
        Schedules a note cluster (chord) for immediate playback.
        Parameters:
        pitch - The MIDI pitches (frequencies) for each note [0-127]
        dynamic - The loudness, MIDI velocity, of the note [0-127]
        duration - The length that the note will sound, in beats

      • changeInstrument

        public void changeInstrument(double instrumentCode)
        Specifies the default instrument
        Parameters:
        instrumentCode - The instrument code number [0-127].

      • loadInstrument

        public void loadInstrument(double instrumentCode)
        Loads the instrument soundfont in the current environment
        Parameters:
        instrumentCode - The instrument code number [0-127].
